title: Retro fitted yield monitoring for combines and crop harvesters
summary: A retro fitted yield monitoring sysem for combines and crop harvesters

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a retrofitted yield monitoring for combines and crop harvesters
eligible.eligibleBullet02: be fitted to the combine or crop harvester (including forage harvester)
eligible.eligibleBullet04: provide information on harvesting rate, with total and partial area (field) yield of crop
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have a yield sensor for combine or forage harvestert
eligible.eligibleBullet06: have an in-cab display or ISOBUS connection and software for downloading data to your computer

notEligible.notEligibleBullet01: software or activation codes for existing sensors and displays
notEligible.notEligibleBullet02: purchase of in-cab displays and software only
